dialogueSequence.sentence: Hey pal, you’re looking pretty ruff today.
Has it been fun being unleashed into the world?
Bark Bark (I don’t know dude, I’m just trying to get home.)
You’re barking up the wrong tree by talking to me. My master will wag his tongue for you.
He’s the one who trained me in fire magic. It’s a shame he went looney after finding that stone.
He must’ve derived it from one of the rare standing stones scattered around the world.
You can call on me using the power stored within that relic.
By the way, the name’s John. Pleased to meet you!
